_source.short_desc: YourMembership is an affordable, all-in-one member management software built for small to mid-sized associations and nonprofits.
_source.long_desc: YourMembership empowers associations, nonprofits and other member-based organizations to deliver more value to their members while streamlining administrative processes. Built for small to mid-sized organizations, the cloud-based membership management software is a comprehensive solution including: membership management, event management, e-Commerce, payments, email marketing, online community, advanced dashboards, and more!
_source.target_audience: YourMembership serves small to mid-sized member-based organizations and associations

category_features.name: Attendance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track specific people who attended events or the total number of attendees

category_features.name: Calendar Management
category_features.definition: Create, manage, and share multiple calendars

category_features.name: Communication Management
category_features.definition: Communicate with and outreach to followers/customers/clients in multiple ways

category_features.name: Event Management
category_features.definition: Schedule and manage the logistics of activities and other gatherings

category_features.name: Membership Management
category_features.definition: Database of members to track personal information of individuals and families

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: Recognition Management
category_features.definition: Track volunteer performance and award those who exceed certain criteria

category_features.name: Registration Management
category_features.definition: Make a list of and register attendees for an event

category_features.name: Scheduling
category_features.definition: Plan availability and assign specific time slots for tasks and resources

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Volunteer Recruiting
category_features.definition: Advertise volunteer opportunities and recruit new volunteers

related_products.short_desc: Sign up tool for group and volunteer managers. Schedule volunteers, organize events and collect money all on one sign up.
related_products.features: SignUpGenius's volunteer management solution coordinates events and volunteers in minutes with online sign ups. The site replaces the need for reply-all emails and spreadsheets and saves organizers time by automating the recruiting and coordinating process. The site is packed with features such as automatic email reminders, additional admin access and slot locking. SignUpGenius simplifies event planning and scales from a basic sign up tool to a powerful Enterprise platform. Try it today!

related_products.short_desc: Volunteer management solution enabling anyone (schools, nonprofits, biz, etc.) to plan events, send invites, receive payments & more.
related_products.features: Free, online SignUps & scheduling solutions from SignUp.com (formerly VolunteerSpot) make it a snap to coordinate groups big & small, for anything! Create volunteer calendars & organize activities in minutes with our simple Planning Wizard & custom themes. Collect contributions, send alerts & updates, track service hours, post waivers & more. Great for nonprofits, schools, leagues, faith groups, businesses, universities, anyone!

related_products.short_desc: Flipcause offers the best online fundraising platform for small nonprofits.
related_products.features: Flipcause is the best online fundraising platform for small nonprofits. With a built-in donor database, mobile app, and payment processing, Flipcause is the only tool you need to manage and accept donations, registrations, volunteers, sponsors, and peer-to-peer and crowdfunding campaigns - all from a single cloud-based dashboard. Along with industry-low pricing, every subscription plan comes with Unlimited Human Support and free Concierge Services.

related_products.short_desc: MobileServe's apps helps individuals and organizations track, verify, and accurately report on their service work and social impact.
related_products.features: MobileServe's mobile and web apps make it easy for individuals to track and verify their service work, while providing institutions with valuable data about their volunteers.   Administrators have access to a dashboard that shows real-time aggregate and individual data about volunteers, their service activities, and economic impact. The dashboard offers robust reporting, event management and goal tracking.

related_products.short_desc: VolunteerLocal provides a user-friendly platform to simplify your volunteer scheduling, communication, and reporting logistics.
related_products.features: With customer support and onboarding included in ALL of our plans, VolunteerLocal is the easiest way to organize, schedule, and communicate with volunteers. With no volunteer username or password requirement, our customers are able to build an incredibly simple process for volunteers from sign up to completion. We offer a recurring shift builder, flexible shift types, and volunteer statuses & qualifications, allowing you to ensure volunteers match with the best qualified opportunities.

related_products.short_desc: Submittable's corporate volunteering platform is easy to use, empowers employees, and gives you the ability to to measure your impact.
related_products.features: Submittable powers you with tools to launch, measure, and grow your social impact programs, locally and globally.  Maximize employee volunteer participation by inviting employees to suggest or create opportunities they care about, lowering the barrier to entry with an easy-to-use system, and making it a social experience to share with colleagues.

related_products.short_desc: EveryAction offers a best-in-class volunteer management platform for nonprofits looking to grow their base of supporters and donors.
related_products.features: Take your volunteer program to the next level with EveryAction's unified nonprofit CRM. Get a 360-degree view of your volunteers, members, and donors with best-in-class volunteer management, fundraising, and digital tools. Easily segment your volunteer lists based on donation history, digital engagement, and previous volunteer activities. Schedule shifts, automate reminder emails, track performance, and personalize follow-up all in the same, powerful platform.

related_products.short_desc: Manage your entire nonprofit with a single CRM! Get all the functionality you need, plus donation webpages & build-in email marketing.
related_products.features:
Manage your entire nonprofit with a single CRM! Choose the Add-on options you need, including Memberships, Case Management, Grant Management and more to create a solution tailored for your exact needs.

Sumac also offers donation webpages, build-in  email marketing tools, and it integrates with your accounting software.

If you manage unique programs and services, Sumac has a Custom Add-on that we'll configure to meet your exact needs,

related_products.short_desc: iMIS is purpose-built for the way you work and designed for the unique needs of association and membership management.
related_products.features: iMIS is purpose-built for the way you work, as the world's only Engagement Management System (EMS), designed to meet the unique management needs of association and membership management. Enjoy all the features you need to effectively manage your organization plus a powerful API with 100s of proven integrations, easy to use dashboards and reports, and an optional Web CMS. Powered by Microsoft Azure, the world's #1 cloud computing platform, iMIS provides automatic upgrades and peak performance.

related_products.short_desc: An online system for recruiting, tracking, and coordinating volunteers in organizations of all kinds and sizes.
related_products.features: Manage your volunteer database from any computer; in the office, at home or on the road. Allow volunteers to fill out applications, submit their schedule preferences and even self schedule, all from the comfort of home. No start-up costs, licensing, or additional fees for support or upgrades. Simply pay a low monthly fee with no long term contract. Volgistics is the industry leader in online volunteer software. Take a video tour and sign up for a free trial account to find out why!

related_products.short_desc: An All-in-One Volunteer Management Software for Nonprofits, Programs, Events, and Corporate Volunteering.
related_products.features: InitLive is a Certified B Corporation dedicated to helping organizations manage and empower more volunteers in less time through its all-in-one staff and volunteer management solution. InitLive's all-in-one solution offers organizations efficient volunteer sign-up, onboarding, scheduling, management, communications, and reporting through a web app and native mobile apps. InitLive holds 5 technology patents that offer real-time communications and data filtering features. Get set up in 1 week!

similar_products.short_desc: Promote volunteer opportunities, register volunteers, track their hours, communicate and report on their activities.
similar_products.features: Get Connected is for organizations that want an easy way to manage, engage, and increase the impact of their volunteers. Since 2009, they've helped thousands of organizations like United Way, Habitat for Humanity, and Humane Society drive 8 million hours of volunteer service and deliver nearly $200 million in community impact. Learn about their commitment to local communities and how they can help your volunteer program by visiting their website and getting a short, free demo of Get Connected.

similar_products.short_desc: An All-in-One Volunteer Management Software for Nonprofits, Programs, Events, and Corporate Volunteering.
similar_products.features: InitLive is a Certified B Corporation dedicated to helping organizations manage and empower more volunteers in less time through its all-in-one staff and volunteer management solution. InitLive's all-in-one solution offers organizations efficient volunteer sign-up, onboarding, scheduling, management, communications, and reporting through a web app and native mobile apps. InitLive holds 5 technology patents that offer real-time communications and data filtering features. Get set up in 1 week!

similar_products.short_desc: VolunteerMatters software is for sophisticated volunteer programs willing to invest in a robust solution to amplify volunteer impact.
similar_products.features:
A VolunteerMatters subscription provides software for established volunteer programs looking to take it to the next level.  Whether they have 200 or 200,000 volunteers, most nonprofits with would love to streamline, grow, or get more out of their volunteer programs but they're stretched thin managing what they already have. 

VolunteerMatters is a new way for you to expand your volunteer program, so you can accomplish more without increasing your workload.

similar_products.short_desc: Mobilize is the events management and volunteer recruitment platform that connects mission-driven organizations and supporters.
similar_products.features:
Trusted by 3,000 campaigns, nonprofits, labor unions, advocacy groups, and more (including 20 Democratic Presidential campaigns, Human Rights Campaign, NARAL, NextGen, NEA, SEIU, When We All Vote, and many more).

We make mobilizing easier. 
We empower supporters.
We supercharge your impact through our network (4M volunteers and growing!). 

Pricing:
Small organizations start at $200/month
Mid-sized organizations start a $500/month
Large organizations start at $2,000/month

similar_products.short_desc: An online system for recruiting, tracking, and coordinating volunteers in organizations of all kinds and sizes.

Allow volunteers to fill out applications, submit their schedule preferences and even self schedule, all from the comfort of home. No start-up costs, licensing, or additional fees for support or upgrades. Simply pay a low monthly fee with no long term contract. Volgistics is the industry leader in online volunteer software. Take a video tour and sign up for a free trial account to find out why!

similar_products.short_desc: Lineup is a volunteer management solution focused on the skills, experience, & diversity of your talent pool to create the best teams.
similar_products.features: Lineup is the integrated cloud-based SaaS volunteer management solution used by leading certification & licensure programs and professional membership associations to effectively and efficiently recruit and manage pools of volunteers to staff committees, project teams, and work groups to achieve a variety of corporate objectives. Lineup's logical design and simple user interface enables project administrators to successfully complete all phases of the volunteer management lifecycle.

similar_products.short_desc: A global-leading, digital volunteer and staff management platform that streamlines end to end workforce management.
similar_products.features:
Get a free demo of Rosterfy's popular Volunteer Management Platform. Used by over 1 million volunteers and staff, Rosterfy helps you automate your workforce management across recruitment, screening, scheduling, communications and training to better engage and retain your volunteers.

Our scalable technology streamlines the previously manual process of workforce management for organisations of all shapes and sizes.

similar_products.short_desc: Configurable volunteer management software for online applications, onboarding, scheduling, communication tools, and reporting.
similar_products.features: VSys One has over 20 years of experience deploying Volunteer Management solutions for organizations with complex needs. Design your own applications, onboarding steps, approval processes, & reports using our user-friendly PC or Web-based software. The system includes automated communications & notifications, reference checking and a custom report generator (in case our 200+ reports are enough!). We provide secure hosting, HIPAA compliance, ability to integrate with other systems & more.

similar_products.short_desc: POINT is the most user friendly volunteer management platform & app for nonprofits. Picture Eventbrite + Salesforce, for volunteering.
similar_products.features:
POINT gives you all the tools for your volunteer program: a cloud-based admin dashboard, website integration, and volunteer iOS + Android app.

1000+ nonprofits love POINT's user-friendly experience. "It has that fast-paced, on-demand feel, and is quick to use, which is not common in volunteer softwares" as quoted in Forbes. 

Unlimited contacts, unlimited admins, unlimited volunteer events. POINT is quick to set up & our team is here for support.

similar_products.short_desc: Raptor Volunteer Management software streamlines application to screening to reporting, and ensures school safety with each check-in.
similar_products.features: Raptor Volunteer Management software streamlines the entire volunteer process from application to reporting. The system includes an integrated online volunteer application, full criminal background checks, volunteer hour tracking, event management, and robust reporting. Each volunteer check-in triggers a new sex offender and custom alert screening. Districts can also efficiently recruit, screen, approve, and communicate with virtual volunteers.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top 360 Degree Feedback software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of 360 Degree Feedback tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: 360 Degree Feedback software is designed to help human resource departments gather all-around information about an employee. Unlike performance assessment software, 360 Degree Feedback applications allow organizations to collect information not only from superiors but also from peers and subordinates, as well as clients. The information collected can be used either for assessment or training purposes. 360 Degree Feedback software is related to Performance Appraisal software, Survey software and Human Resource software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Church Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Church Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Church Management software handles functions such as accounting, donation tracking, service attendance, membership, schedules and activities. Churches use these applications to automate and organize administrative functions including document creation, outreach and event scheduling. Management software helps churches better track resources and foster communication among administrators as well as staff, ministry leaders, members and visitors. Church Management software is related to Fund Accounting software, Fundraising software and Membership Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Donation Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Donation Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Donation Management software helps nonprofit organizations collect, track, and distribute funds contributed by their patrons, maintain donors' information, and connect with them during fundraising campaigns. Payment processing capabilities as well as contact management features are essential parts of this software. For related software solutions see Fundraising software, Grant Management software and Payment Processing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Event Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Event Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Event Management software automates marketing, registration, coordination and scheduling of events. Planners use Event Management applications to manage the planning and process of meetings and events, including marketing, attendee registration, badge creation, calendar generation and venue space management. These applications also offer a variety of self-service functions for event attendees such as online registration, content delivery and fee payment. Event Management software is related to Registration software and Ticketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fundraising software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fundraising tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fundraising software manages donor and pledge information associated with fundraising campaigns. Development professionals use Fundraising applications to enhance their ability to locate, manage and grow donor sources. Fundraising software facilitates cost effective targeting of likely donors, tracks pledges, and manages contributions and donor relationship management. These applications also provide a variety of tools allowing fundraisers to track the effectiveness of their development campaigns. Fundraising software is related to Church Management software, Event Management software and Political Campaign software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Nonprofit software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Nonprofit tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Nonprofit software automates all aspects of nonprofit operations from database management, to fundraising, to accounting and CRM. Nonprofit software is related to Donation Management software and Nonprofit Accounting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Political Campaign software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Political Campaign tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Political Campaign software provides financial and management tools, contribution tracking, a voter database, and other features to help political candidates and PACs more effectively manage campaigns. Campaign managers use these software applications to efficiently identify likely donors, target voters for outreach efforts, manage volunteers, track contributions, and assess the effectiveness of campaigns. Political Campaign software also typically offers demographic and voter behavior data, polling tools, call center integration and other campaign management necessities such as regulatory compliance monitoring. Political Campaign software is related to Fundraising software.

related_products.short_desc: Manage memberships & waivers, get booked 24/7, seamlessly process payments, send marketing emails & run reports. Starts at $25/month.
related_products.features: Use our all-in-one membership management software & app to manage and grow your business. Get booked & paid 24/7. Stay safe with 100% contactless check-in & checkout. Advertise your virtual and in-person classes on the Vagaro Marketplace. Reduce no-shows with automated reminders. Manage classes and memberships on any device. Send waivers and forms. Vagaro Pro is the most downloaded/reviewed Apple & Android App. Prices start @ $25/month. Sign up for a Free 1 Month Trial.

related_products.short_desc: Squarespace is the all-in-one platform to build a beautiful website, online store, or portfolio.
related_products.features: Squarespace is the all-in-one platform to build a beautiful online presence. Look like an expert right from the start with award-winning templates for your website, online store, or portfolio. Customize the design to fit your personal style and professional needs. Get found in search by more people with powerful SEO tools. Learn where your website traffic is coming from, what your visitors are looking for, and how they're interacting with your content or products with in-depth Analytics tools.

related_products.short_desc: Mindbody wellness business management software is tailored to businesses that need business and membership management systems.
related_products.features: Mindbody empowers your members to own their wellness experience. From member profiles and automated reminders to self check-in, your all-in-one software will keep everyone moving. Plus, with a custom app, members can update their info and schedule on the go?from the comfort of your brand. Manage and grow your community with ease. Schedule your free demo today.

related_products.short_desc: Affordable, All-In-One Solution to streamline website management,  membership dues, email marketing and more. Try a Demo!
related_products.features:
---- TRY OUR 7-DAY FREE TRIAL:
https://www.brilliantdirectories.com/trial  ----

Brilliant Directories offers an Affordable, All-In-One Member Management Solution to streamline all aspects of your membership website or association.  A complete, turn-key solution with quick setup and free, unlimited support from real people. Includes website design, online payment processing, multi-level memberships, past due monitoring, premium member's only content, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Track donors, donations and pledges for your church.  Accept online donations (integrated with most online giving providers).
related_products.features: "Save time and get more done, with fewer headaches." Easily keep track of your members, dues, contributions, pledges and more... Starts at $47.98 (one-time cost, no monthly fees; no attendance tracking, accounting or payroll) Print or email yearly tax receipts and quarterly statements. Print membership photo directory.  Share data like web-based software without the monthly fee, using DropBox or Google Drive.  Exports data to QuickBooks.  PC or Mac.

related_products.short_desc: Membership Management Software for board volunteers who want to grow their membership while saving time!
related_products.features: Want to grow your membership? Let StarChapter manage your membership data and increase retention rates so, you have more time for outreach. The software combines emails, event registration, membership, website design, and payment processing. Our StarChapter Project Manager will set up your service with you, coordinate the project for you, and train users even when the board transitions. Get access to 24/7 online technical support and industry resources.

related_products.short_desc: Easily manage your members, process payments, send out emails, register event attendees, create a website and more.
related_products.features: WildApricot is a complete membership management system, designed to fit your organizations needs. Easily manage your contacts, process payments, send out emails, register event attendees, create a website and more. With a self serve design and a user friendly interface, you have the freedom to customize every aspect of your membership management system. If you need help at any step of the way, our support team and community of experts are ready to help guide you and share their best practices.

related_products.short_desc: Increase engagement & revenue with a sophisticated membership management solution designed to support both nonprofits & associations.
related_products.features:
Increase engagement & drive more revenue with Neon CRM, a sophisticated membership management solution designed to support both nonprofits and associations.

Build better relationships with event and experience management, activity tracking, marketing tools, and more!

Put your members in control with a member log-in portal to check their membership status, a custom member directory, and exclusive content. 

Ready for a more intuitive approach to member management?

related_products.short_desc: The complete front office and back office for your club or association: website, member database, events, forums, and much more.
related_products.features: ClubExpress is the economical Internet-based solution for smaller professional and trade associations (25-5000 members). ClubExpress combines your association web site with the membership database, online member signups/renewals/expirations, event calendar & registration, credit-card processing, membership directory, committees, forums, documents, interests, benefits, etc. We use state-of-the-art security, there's no advertising and associations own their data at all times.

related_products.short_desc: Simplify membership management with MemberClicks; the all-in-one solution for staff who need to save time and grow their membership.

Engage members with email nurturing, online learning, job postings, and more. Today, over 3,000 clients across North America trust MemberClicks to fulfill their missions.

related_products.short_desc: Online booking, resource scheduling, lead generation, and reporting solution for every business.
related_products.features: An all-in-one solution for your business! We feature a sophisticated scheduler for all your appointments and classes, email marketing, merchant processing, payroll, reputation management, robust reporting, a rewards program, and many more features. There are no pricey add-on fees to embed your schedule into your site, generate reviews, send emails/SMS notifications, rewards program, marketing automations, or anything else. WellnessLiving was built by our customers, for our customers!

similar_products.features:
Member365 combines the functionality of your email campaign manager, financial software, and CRM to create a platform custom-made for Membership Managers.

Automate busy work to spend less time managing member data, and more time understanding member needs. Create email campaigns in seconds by building lists from your Member365 CRM. Understand who is likely to churn, and more, with Engagement Analytics.

With Member365, your work is about managing members, not just their data.

similar_products.short_desc: Unlock the potential of your community with the most flexible and powerful all-in-one solution for community management and engagement.

Easy to set up and fully branded to match your colors, Hivebrite helps you build brand engagement and create opportunities for your private community. similar_products.short_desc: SaaS solution that provides an organization with a member database, website content tools, online event registration, and much more!

similar_products.short_desc: Used by organizations to manage their memberships, integrate their other SaaS platforms, & automate their critical tasks.
similar_products.features: Join It is a membership management service that enables organizations to effectively keep track, manage, and grow their community. At our core, we provide a simple database and dashboard interface for organization leaders to monitor developments in their membership. We then integrate this database context with best in class service providers to automate other essential components of an organization, like payment processing, email communication, and event organization.

similar_products.short_desc: Mindbody wellness business management software is tailored to businesses that need business and membership management systems.
similar_products.features: Mindbody empowers your members to own their wellness experience. From member profiles and automated reminders to self check-in, your all-in-one software will keep everyone moving. Plus, with a custom app, members can update their info and schedule on the go?from the comfort of your brand. Manage and grow your community with ease. Schedule your free demo today.

similar_products.short_desc: SmartRec by Amilia is the smartest and easiest way to offer, manage, and sell activities. Engage communities online effortlessly.
similar_products.features:
Amilia SmartRec empowers businesses, community organizations and Parks & Recreation agencies to better serve their community with activities.  

We make it easy for your community to find, register and pay for activities online. You'll save time and get to do more of what you love - it's eCommerce for activities!  

When your registration process is simple and effortlessly accessed by your community, you'll generate even more engagement. Not to mention, you'll see a huge bump in signups.

similar_products.short_desc: Our gym and fitness studio membership management system is the all-in-1 place to manage your daily admin tasks & increase revenue.
similar_products.features: Our gym and fitness studio membership management software gives you an all-in-1 place to manage your daily admin tasks & increase revenue. Enhance your member's experience with a mobile app they can use to book classes, make purchases and engage with your studio. With our website schedule integrations, make sure your members can easily find and view your class schedule. We also provide a check-in kiosk which will free up time before a class for you to engage with your members and prospects.

similar_products.short_desc: Manage memberships & waivers, get booked 24/7, seamlessly process payments, send marketing emails & run reports. Starts at $25/month.
similar_products.features: Use our all-in-one membership management software & app to manage and grow your business. Get booked & paid 24/7. Stay safe with 100% contactless check-in & checkout. Advertise your virtual and in-person classes on the Vagaro Marketplace. Reduce no-shows with automated reminders. Manage classes and memberships on any device. Send waivers and forms. Vagaro Pro is the most downloaded/reviewed Apple & Android App. Prices start @ $25/month. Sign up for a Free 1 Month Trial.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Association Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Association Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Association Management software automates management functions including fundraising, membership, event management and other operations. These software packages typically offer many features to empower and inform association members, as well as administration and business process tools for association managers. Associations use these applications to communicate with their constituents, share resources, promote events, collect fees and recruit new members. Association Management software is related to Membership Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Church Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Church Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Church Management software handles functions such as accounting, donation tracking, service attendance, membership, schedules and activities. Churches use these applications to automate and organize administrative functions including document creation, outreach and event scheduling. Management software helps churches better track resources and foster communication among administrators as well as staff, ministry leaders, members and visitors. Church Management software is related to Fund Accounting software, Fundraising software and Membership Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Club Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Club Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Club Management software automates management functions including membership, fees, dues and other operations for fitness, social and civic clubs or other similar organizations. These applications offer integrated solutions for access management as well as sales and marketing tools for club facilities. Club Management solutions also help track business performances through automated reporting and forecasting on sales performance, member retention rates and revenue generation. Club Management software is related to Membership Management software, Visitor Management software, and Registration software.

related_categories.description: Fundraising software manages donor and pledge information associated with fundraising campaigns. Development professionals use Fundraising applications to enhance their ability to locate, manage and grow donor sources. Fundraising software facilitates cost effective targeting of likely donors, tracks pledges, and manages contributions and donor relationship management. These applications also provide a variety of tools allowing fundraisers to track the effectiveness of their development campaigns. Fundraising software is related to Church Management software, Event Management software and Political Campaign software.
